articles.content:
Atalanta midfielder Ruslan Malinovskyi admitted he fancies the Premier League but claimed ‘there are no conditions to talk about a transfer’.

articles.title: Gomez: 'We made Atalanta a big club'
articles.description: Alejandro ‘Papu’ Gomez reveals the moment he recognised Atalanta could become a big club and how Gian Piero Gasperini changed their mentality. “We started this incredible journey.”
articles.content:
Alejandro ‘Papu’ Gomez reveals the moment he recognised Atalanta could become a big club and how Gian Piero Gasperini changed their mentality. “We started this incredible journey.”
